metadata.title: CVE-2021-22210 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 13.2. When querying the repository branches through API,GitLab was ignoring a query parameter and returning a considerable amountof results.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
